oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Prayer in Arabic invoking blessings of God on Prophet Muḥammad who is described with various epithets.
Local paper. Paper in fair condition though slightly discolored.
Written in black ink, 10-11 lines per page.
Pamphlet binding, single section sewn through fold, leather guards on inside fold; leather covers.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Arabic and Sindhi in Gujarati and Khojki scripts.
